Instruction: Whisk the eggs in a bowl using an electric mixer until they become thick and lemon-yellow, about 3 to 5 minutes.
Combine flour, sugar, and salt in another bowl and sift them together. Then incorporate this into the egg mixture, mixing until the batter is smooth.
Grease a griddle with butter and warm it over medium heat. Pour tablespoon-sized amounts of batter onto the griddle and spread them to form thin pancakes.
Cook until the bottom is lightly browned, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve warm with syrup or toppings of your choice.
